folderDropzone.placeholderSubtitle: You may also drop a JSON file previously exported from Archifiltre.
folderDropzone.zipNotificationMessage: Archifiltre doesn't handle zips, please unzip them to read them
folderDropzone.disclaimerSubtitle: Your data won't leave your computer. Only you can see what happens in this app.
folderDropzone.loadingErrorMessage: You probably neither dropped a folder nor a file.
folderDropzone.wrongJsonVersion: The file you dropped wasn't produced with the same version of Archifiltre
folderDropzone.errorsWhileLoading: An error occurred while loading. Click to check the error log.

report.fileHashExplanation: This hash is a file digital fingerprint computed with the MD5 algorithm
report.folderHashExplanation: This hash is a digital fingerprint (computed with the MD5 algorithm) of this folder's children hashes concatenation

workspace.cannotMoveElement: Cannot move file or folder here
workspace.nameConflict: Name conflict with one of this folder elements

header.csvWithHashDisabledMessage: You must wait for hashes to have been computed

hash.loadingErrorMessage: An error occurred while loading hashes. Click here for more details.
hash.title: Hash

export.metsExportErrorFileDoesNotExist: File "{{filePath}}" cannot be found. It may have been moved or deleted.
export.metsExportErrorCannotAccessFile: Cannot access file "{{filePath}}". You may have lost access to the file.
export.exportSuccessMessage: The METS zip has been created in the projet parent folder
export.resipExportSuccessMessage: The metadata file has been exported to project root folder

replay.title: Restore previous session
replay.error: An error occurred while restoring the previous session.

errorDescriptions.EBUSY: The resource is busy. Maybe it's currently used by another process.
errorDescriptions.EACCES: You do not have the rights to access this file.
